Pawnmorph.AspectDef.label: increased production
Pawnmorph.AspectDef.description: This pawn's biochemistry has been modified such that their mutations output rate has been increased. This has caused them to become increasingly hungry, so be sure to keep them fed.

li.label: productive
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s productive mutations output rate has been increased. This has caused them to become increasingly hungry, so be sure to keep them fed.

li.label: very productive
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s production output and caloric intake have been further increased. Take care, as their body may not be able to handle further productive increases.

li.label: productive bliss
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s productive mutations have achieved maximum productive output. The constant production has left their body and mind weakened, and they may occasionally fall into a catatonic state as a result.
